txt.en: 'That's it then. A job well done.\n\n'So long as we keep their numbers from going out of control, they shouldn't be a nuisance to this town.'
Defeat kergrim on the island south-west of Bakhjâd ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'We've got a good thing going aroun' 'ere, and I don't want to screw it up, but these kergrim are presentin' a huge problem for us and our clientele. If we can't get this population under control, we'll take huge losses.\n\n'Why don't you make yourself useful, and get out there? Fight, and take care of the kergrim population count.'
Tarshiah has asked you to help cull the population of kergrim on the coast west of Mâr Naphra.
Tarshiah laments about the growing population of kergrim threatening the coast off Bakhjâd.
Now that the task is complete you should report back to Tarshiah.
